title: Army bids colourful farewell to Gen. Shavendra Silva
body_lines: Military formalities, including a Guard-Turn Out and a colour-rich Guard of Honour saluted the outgoing 23rd Commander of the Sri Lanka Army, General Shavendra Silva at the formal farewell ceremony, held at the Army Headquarters this afternoon (31), amidst a representative gathering of senior officers and other ranks of the Army. (KM)
